# anypoint_team (Data Source)

Reads a specific `team` in the business group.

## Example Usage

```terraform
resource "anypoint_team" "team" {
  org_id = var.root_org
  id     = "TEAM_ID"
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- **id** (String) The ID of this resource.
- **org_id** (String)

### Optional

- **ancestor_team_ids** (List of String)

### Read-Only

- **created_at** (String)
- **team_id** (String)
- **team_name** (String)
- **team_type** (String)
- **updated_at** (String)
